articles.description: Follow live text updates as Brighton, Liverpool, Ajax and Aston Villa feature in Europe.
articles.title: European football: Ajax v Brighton & Toulouse v Liverpool - radio, score & text

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound commentary and follow text updates as Aberdeen face PAOK in the Europa Conference League before Rangers host Sparta Prague in the Europa League.
articles.title: Europa Conference League: Aberdeen face PAOK in Greece

articles.description: The father of the Liverpool footballer was handed over to UN and Catholic Church officials.
articles.title: Footballer Luis Díaz's father freed by Colombian guerrillas

articles.description: New Zealand look set for a World Cup semi-final spot after comfortably beating Sri Lanka by five wickets.
articles.title: New Zealand beat Sri Lanka to all but reach semis

articles.description: Newcastle United striker Callum Wilson is recalled to the England squad by manager Gareth Southgate for their final two Euro 2024 qualifiers against Malta and North Macedonia.
articles.title: Newcastle striker Wilson recalled to England squad

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a look back at some of the greatest late goals in Premier League history, featuring Sergio Aguero, Harry Kane and Demarai Gray.
articles.title: Aguero, Kane and Gray in best Premier League last-minute goals

articles.description: Following his record-breaking double century to guide Australia into the World Cup semi-finals, Glenn Maxwell joins No Balls: The Cricket Podcast.
articles.title: 'My whole body was shaking' - Maxwell on record 201

articles.description: Claressa Shields grew up without support, protection or a bed to call her own. She has since scaled the heights to bring joy to Flint, a city that has become a byword for a broken American dream.
articles.title: 'Don't mess with Claressa' - a fighter as hard as Flint

articles.description: Watch highlights as New Zealand secure an easy five-wicket win over Sri Lanka in Bengaluru to all but seal a World Cup semi-final spot
articles.title: New Zealand on brink of semis after easy win over Sri Lanka

articles.description: Britain's Jack Draper continues his good run of form with victory over Turkey's Cem Ilkel in the last eight of the Sofia Open in Bulgaria
articles.title: Draper eases into last four at Sofia Open
